name: Galaxy Hotel & Spa

reviews.text: For a business trip to India, my colleague and I had booked 2 rooms for 1 night late August 2010. After a long flight into New Delhi, we got into a taxi around 130AM and were on our way to the hotel. The taxi driver needed directions and we ended up calling the hotel. That is when our misery started.
reviews.title: A confirmed reservation with a credit card on file is no guarantee for a room...

reviews.text: The night shift clerk told us that both our reservations were indeed confirmed but that there were no rooms for us since a group failed to check out earlier that day. These things happen in business travel but with a phone number and e-mail address on file at the hotel, we could have been warned well beforehand.
reviews.title: Evening in Howzaat

reviews.text: To make things worse, I specifically asked the night shift clerk to make a note in the system about my call so that we would not be charged 'no show' fees. Well the corporate credit card statement is in and what can one guess..'no show' fees have been charged for both reservations.
reviews.title: Amaging Conference Experience in Galaxy Hotel @ Gurgaon

reviews.text: Of course this review is partially incomplete since I can't judge the overall quality of the hotel. However be forewarned about the Galaxy Hotel when thinking about guaranteeing reservations with your credit card. You may just end up in a 'taxi driver' selected hotel in the middle of the night...just like us...and still be charged a 'no show' fee.
reviews.title: Most prefered hotel!!

reviews.text: My review is for this resturant 'Howzaat' in hotel Galaxy. Amazing resturant - The resturant is built on a cricket theme, which is very well done. From seats/sofas, tables, entrance, washrooms...excellently done. Food served is very decent, this is not a dinner plance but an evening place where you can watch cricket on big screen and enjoy your beer. This is a beer brewery as well, they serve 3 diff kinds of beer, i loved the dark one. Overall it was very diff and nice experience.
reviews.title: Good experience

reviews.text: I've stayed at this property four times in the past year. Compared to other 4 star properties in Delhi, this one is one of my favorites. First off, don't be scared by the travel distance from the airport. It is generally faster to head out to Gurgoan to the Galaxy than to try to get to one of the Sheratons or something else in the center of town. Just make sure your taxi knows where he's going, as I have had a taxi get lost coming out this way. The rooms are modern, and include FREE internet - which is always a winner for me. Rooms I've enjoyed have always been spacious, well-appointed, and have nice bathrooms with premium amenities and nice soaker tubs.
reviews.title: Nice genuine 4* option, worth a try

reviews.text: I heartily recommend the pool area and spa/gym (although the pool was closed for renovations in March - hope its open again soon). There is an adjacent shopping mall with a SUPER funky little Chinese restaurant, a nice steak/chophouse, and a fun brew-on-premises cricket-themed pub which gets hopping during any 20-20 games.
reviews.title: Amazing rooms, and bathroom
nice hotel,Overall would recommend the hotel to the fellow travelers for their amazing dining options and nice rooms
reviews.text: The service has always been very pleasant to me, although I had a dispute with them on the last trip over the mini-bar (I was right in the end) which wasn't handled that well. Why are we fighting over a $10 charge on a $1000 bill for a repeat customer? I guess this is just Delhi...
Anyways - I would go back again in a flash, assuming the pool is open.
reviews.title: great business class hotel for Budget travelers

reviews.text: The rooms are amazing - modern, elegant, and technologically advanced as well.
reviews.title: loved everything

reviews.text: This is a 5-star property. Rooms were very large and very clean, service was over the top (as expected for this hotel class), and requests were generally well handled.
reviews.title: Rather stay at a property with more going on.

reviews.text: Internet went down twice during the 4 night stay, had to call and ask for it to be reset - but they insisted sending someone to my room to check - i'd rather just get a call when its back up, but thats not how they do it.
reviews.title: Not a five star experience

reviews.text: Hotel claims to have a western restaurant, but couldn't find it the first night, and when I asked, found out it was under renovation. This left the main restaurant, the asian restaurant, and the cricket pub as the dining options. I didn't try the cricket pub but thought the food was so-so in the other restaurants.
reviews.title: Stay was Memorable & Enjoyable with amenties phenomenal

reviews.text: There was an odd odor in the hallway and not quite sure what that was from. Hotel was nice to accomodate a late checkout (around 3pm).
reviews.title: Super souvenir

reviews.text: The hotel is quite a bit far from anything. The hotel tends to be on the opposite side (the west side) of the main business offices, and a bit south. I'd try stay at a hotel closer to the offices if I return to Gurgaon. Taking a taxi from the hotel to a restaurant, etc. is an expensive endeavour.
reviews.title: A good hotel that I want to come back again!

reviews.text: Nice hotel for conference and training purpose...I attanded a official training and really food quality was good. staff was very polite and well dressed....seating arrangement and voice system which was provided was good.....the only thing which is not good is about the traffic jam to gurgaon.....
reviews.title: Good Hotel for training and conference

reviews.text: I was very impressed with the Galaxy Hotel and would highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent service, very clean and modern business hotel.

reviews.text: My room was quite large and importantly, very clean. The bathroom in particular is very nice and modern; I'm not sure if it's standard but I had a rainfall shower which is a real treat.
reviews.title: Comfortable Business Hotel

reviews.text: The service is honestly the best I've experienced anywhere. It's so welcoming, helpful and polite that you almost feel guilty.
reviews.title: Multi-Tasking

reviews.text: There is a good selection of food upstairs. The Howzatt cricket-themed bar is great for beer but the food is not exactly healthy and refreshing.
reviews.title: Good Hotel.

description: A contemporary styled five star hotel offers spacious comfort and rich warm, hospitable services. Conveniently located in Gurgaon, Galaxy offers a choice of accommodation, dining options, banqueting facilities, recreational activities and business facilities that make the hotel ideal for business and leisure guests. The galaxy offers the best standards in hospitality complemented with finest restaurants offering a plethora of world’s cuisine. The standards of service are very high, which are evident from the hospitality offered by the hotel. Acknowledged across the world for its style, grandeur, sophistication and superior services, it is the ideal place to stay for a truly rewarding experience. The hotel is well connected via Highway 8 and is just twenty minute drive from the domestic & international airports.
